definition[0]: to refuse to give someone something
example[0]: I withheld payment until they had completed the work.
example[1]: Ian was accused of withholding vital information from the police.
definition[1]: to refuse to let someone have something
example[2]: Part of your salary is withheld for income tax.
example[3]: The computer giant has hinted that it has some big plans, but has withheld details.
